column5: Has anyone been to this resort/camp? Looking for a drive in camp around Wawa and wanted some input. Thanks

I've paddled through it. Very beautiful lake, not overly large with a good number of private camps on it besides the lodge.The adjacent back lakes around Anjigami hold much more interest to me as an angler than the main lake.
Main lake holds no fish, it's a wst of time. The back lakes hold a decent amount of fish. Food is fantastic, hosts are great people. There are better places to fish...............
